summary: Encapsulates all configurable parameters for Cohere's text generation API, allowing precise control over the number of outputs, token limits, input truncation, randomness, preset selection, stop/end sequences, sampling strategies, repetition penalties, likelihood reporting, and token biasing.
business_intent: Provides developers a convenient, typed way to tailor AI text generation behavior for applications such as chatbots, content creation, summarization, and other languageâ€‘model driven services.
